ygData.subject: The Tables Have Turned
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry I havn t posted today so far, but my comp broke down and I just spent the last 5 hours trying to fix it. ... The Cybertronian Fire s defences come to

Subject: The Tables Have Turned
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Sorry I havn't posted today so far, but my comp broke down and I just spent 
the last 5 hours trying to fix it.

::Striker/Kluster/Rex/Firearm/Ramulus/Smokescreem/Killer/Zeus::

The Cybertronian Fire's defences come to life once again, the four laser 
batteries firing at Hades, Koga, Serpentor, and Unitron.

One of the missile launchers fires a missile at Anubis, another firing at 
Ares.

The EMP cannons swirl around, firing at Koga before sliding back into the 
ship to recharge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker flies into the battlefield, firing his shoulder blasters at Hades as 
he lands.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster nods at Deemos. "Firearm, show him the CR chamber."

"Me?!" Firearm almost yells, "What about the battle?!" he indicates the 
sounds of gunfire.

"That's an order, Firearm," Kluster says firmly, turning to fire at Anubis.

Firearm sighs, firing off one shot from his arm cannon at Serpentor. "Follow 
me," he says to Deemos, entering the Cybertronian Fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"More suicidal preds!" Rex yells, running at Ares and firing at him, dodging 
a shot.
